TextBlock.Text: MENTH: The <Color=orange>community</Color> is said to have collapsed due to the conflict. There are other planets in this star system besides this one, so there may be a conflict with them.
MENTH: But what did the king, who remained alone, do? He didn't take revenge, what was he thinking?
CUMIN: Even if the battle is over, it's going to happen again because of this guy spinning around at the top?
SACCO: It's like there's something that causes endless death and rebirth. I wonder if such a thing really exists.
CUMIN: Is it somewhere in the universe? How did it come about? Is this a machine made by someone?
MENTH: And what worries me is... something as if there is a way to step out of that circle and become nothing. Did this king have any means?
